What are the necessary steps to create a visually appealing logo design for National Park Service using JavaScript code and ensuring the logo is in vector format? The design should include a serene landscape with mountains and trees, the official National Park Service arrowhead symbol, and the text "National Park Service" in bold modern font. Also, please provide JSON data for all design elements and a sample JavaScript code that generates the logo. 
Additionally, can you please include an HTML page that showcases the logo design and its vector format?
